headline: Is It Time To Reassess Arista Networks (ANET) After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are trying to figure out whether Arista Networks is attractively priced or starting to look stretched, you will want to see how its current share price stacks up against a few different valuation yardsticks. The stock recently closed at US$123.42, with returns of a 10% decline over 7 days, a 1.1% decline over 30 days and a 7.6% decline year to date, while the 1 year return sits at 9.6% and the 3 year return is very large. Recent coverage has focused on Arista's role in data center and...

headline: ANET vs. COMM: Which Infrastructure Stock is the Smarter Buy Now?
summary: Arista and CommScope are both gaining ground, but the former's software-driven edge may give it the upper hand in infrastructure.
